title: Turkish Series 'Lovers Anonymous' Full Trailer - Curing 'Love Disease'
description: "Your last hope. Call me before you ruin your life." Netflix has unveiled the official trailer for a streaming comedy series called Lovers Anonymous, about the kooky guy who runs a Love Hospital in Turkey. A fun look at love in the modern world. This looks like something along the lines of The Lobster or Fingernails or Equals. Cem, scarred by a childhood that crushed his trust in love, runs the "Love Hospital" (to cure those suffering from the "love disease") – until Hazal, who believes in the power of love, disrupts his life. Will they both change each other? Will Cem learn to appreciate the power of love? This stars Halit Ergenc, Funda Eryiğit, Rıza Kocaoğlu, Zerrin Nişancı, Selcuk Borak, İdil Fırat, Ceren Benderlioğlu, & Seda Akman. All of Cem's success and dreams now depend on Hazal, an unexpected presence in his life who, in stark contrast to him, believes that love will save the world. Which side do you fall on? Do you still believe in the power of love? This has some smart humor & looks like it may actually be worth a watch - check it out. Here's the official trailer for Netflix's romance series Lovers […]
author: Alex Billington

text: by January 7, 2025Source: YouTube "Your last hope. Call me before you ruin your life." Netflix has unveiled the official trailer for a streaming comedy series called Lovers Anonymous, about the kooky guy who runs a Love Hospital in Turkey. A fun look at love in the modern world. This looks like something along the lines of The Lobster or Fingernails or Equals. Cem, scarred by a childhood that crushed his trust in love, runs the "Love Hospital" (to cure those suffering from the "love disease") – until Hazal, who believes in the power of love, disrupts his life. Will they both change each other? Will Cem learn to appreciate the power of love? This stars Halit Ergenc, Funda Eryiğit, Rıza Kocaoğlu, Zerrin Nişancı, Selcuk Borak, İdil Fırat, Ceren Benderlioğlu, & Seda Akman. All of Cem's success and dreams now depend on Hazal, an unexpected presence in his life who, in stark contrast to him, believes that love will save the world. Which side do you fall on? Do you still believe in the power of love? This has some smart humor & looks like it may actually be worth a watch - check it out. Here's the official trailer for Netflix's romance series Lovers Anonymous, from Netflix's YouTube: You can rewatch the teaser trailer for Netflix's Lovers Anonymous series right here for more footage. Cem (Halit Ergenç), scarred by a childhood that crushed his trust in love, is the invisible hero of his modern day Love Hospital, a place he established to cure those suffering from the "love disease." All of Cem's success and dreams now depend on Hazal (Funda Eryiğit), an unexpected presence in his life who, in stark contrast to him, believes that love will save the world. Lovers Anonymous, also known as Adsiz Asiklar in Turkish, is a series created and showrun by Turkish filmmaker / writer Basar Basaran ("Double Trouble", "Azize", "Bir Zamanlar Kibris", "Kader Oyunlari"). It's also written by Basar Basaran. Featuring episodes directed by filmmaker Umur Turagay (director of Karisik Pizza, 17 Mayis, For Both Of Us, Portrait of Beauty, "Interrupted", "Hot Skull", "Shahmaran"). Executive produced by Basar Basaran, Cem Chaban, Çagatay Önal, Emre Özdür. Made by Cumartesi Film. Netflix will release the new Lovers Anonymous series streaming on Netflix worldwide starting on January 16th, 2025 right after New Years. Anyone interested? Find more posts in: Foreign Films, Streaming, To Watch, Trailer
html:
by
January 7, 2025
Source: YouTube

"Your last hope. Call me before you ruin your life." Netflix has unveiled the official trailer for a streaming comedy series called Lovers Anonymous, about the kooky guy who runs a Love Hospital in Turkey. A fun look at love in the modern world. This looks like something along the lines of The Lobster or Fingernails or Equals. Cem, scarred by a childhood that crushed his trust in love, runs the "Love Hospital" (to cure those suffering from the "love disease") – until Hazal, who believes in the power of love, disrupts his life. Will they both change each other? Will Cem learn to appreciate the power of love? This stars Halit Ergenc, Funda Eryiğit, Rıza Kocaoğlu, Zerrin Nişancı, Selcuk Borak, İdil Fırat, Ceren Benderlioğlu, & Seda Akman. All of Cem's success and dreams now depend on Hazal, an unexpected presence in his life who, in stark contrast to him, believes that love will save the world. Which side do you fall on? Do you still believe in the power of love? This has some smart humor & looks like it may actually be worth a watch - check it out.

Here's the official trailer for Netflix's romance series Lovers Anonymous, from Netflix's YouTube:

You can rewatch the teaser trailer for Netflix's Lovers Anonymous series right here for more footage.

Cem (Halit Ergenç), scarred by a childhood that crushed his trust in love, is the invisible hero of his modern day Love Hospital, a place he established to cure those suffering from the "love disease." All of Cem's success and dreams now depend on Hazal (Funda Eryiğit), an unexpected presence in his life who, in stark contrast to him, believes that love will save the world. Lovers Anonymous, also known as Adsiz Asiklar in Turkish, is a series created and showrun by Turkish filmmaker / writer Basar Basaran ("Double Trouble", "Azize", "Bir Zamanlar Kibris", "Kader Oyunlari"). It's also written by Basar Basaran. Featuring episodes directed by filmmaker Umur Turagay (director of Karisik Pizza, 17 Mayis, For Both Of Us, Portrait of Beauty, "Interrupted", "Hot Skull", "Shahmaran"). Executive produced by Basar Basaran, Cem Chaban, Çagatay Önal, Emre Özdür. Made by Cumartesi Film. Netflix will release the new Lovers Anonymous series streaming on Netflix worldwide starting on January 16th, 2025 right after New Years. Anyone interested?

Find more posts in: Foreign Films, Streaming, To Watch, Trailer
